faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: Can I change my plan later?
faq.a1: Yes, you can upgrade from the trial to the Pro plan at any time from your administrative dashboard.
faq.a2: No, our pricing is transparent. The Pro plan fee covers all features listed. Transaction fees from payment gateways (like Stripe) may apply to your course sales.
faq.q3: Do you offer custom enterprise solutions?
faq.a3: Yes, for large organizations with specific needs, we offer custom enterprise plans. Please contact our sales team for more information.
